meaning: instant, namely, as is, conform, agree, adapt

onyomiExamples.meaning: instantly, immediately, at once, equals, means, is, oneness (of two opposing things), inseparability
coming together and dissolving into oneness, being closely related, being inseparable
immediate sex (without taking a shower first)

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to take (seat, position, course, office, etc.), to assume, to be hired, to be employed, to ascend (the throne), to accede, to start (on a journey), to commence, to depart, to study (under teacher), to be an apprentice
to install (a king, emperor, etc.), to appoint (to a post), to promote, to assign (to study under)
